subject: Lost Order Number
description_text:
Hi! I ordered a
Simsonn Plus X Hydraulic Pedal Black Set, P2H2 with baseplate last Friday
but I don’t believe I ever received an email confirmation. I’m not sure if
i input some information wrong so I’m wondering if you would be able to
help find the order number/email. The shipping and contact information
should be:
Email (could be 1 of 2)
• Granthwise@gmail.com
• Granthwiser@gmail.com

Phone: 8133940109

Shipping Address: 77 Park Ave Apt 713 Hoboken NJ 07030

If you need any more information please let me know

Thank you,
Grant Wise

conversations.body_text: Hi Grant Wise,     I’ve located your order SSN2830.  The tracking number is FedEx • 884926739395.
